property.name: Traits
property.value: Light Armor Dragon Mythic

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Rawr! I'm a scary dragon!" - Goblin in kobold costume

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to reduce Fire damage dealt to you to 0, then roll 1d12. On a 1, banish this card. Bury this card and expend a mythic charge to add 1d20 to your check to defeat a monster. Banish this card to reduce all damage dealt to you to 0; if proficient in light armors, bury this card instead.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Piggy, piggy, piggy, pig! Hard to ride when they get big! So catch yourself a piggy pup, And ride him till the sun comes up!" - Goblin lullaby

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If defeated, draw 1d4 random items from the box, choose 1 and add to your hand, then banish the rest. If undefeated, you are dealt 1 Combat damage; choose another character at your location to draw a card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The difficulty to defeat this barrier is increased by twice the adventure deck number of the current scenario, if any. If undefeated, draw a number of cards equal to your hand size, then bury that number of cards. After you act, stash a number of plunder cards equal to your hand size.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Roll 'em bigger, hurt 'em worse Don't you worry 'bout the curse! Giant boulder rumbles fine 'Specially when death's on the line!" --Plarg's song

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display this card next to your deck; the barrier is defeated. You may banish this card to roll 2d20. Add the higher result to your check, then bury a number of card from your hand, discard pile, and deck equal to the lower result.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Yummy squid! Salty! Tough! Tasy 'cause they fight so rough. But if squid have goblin grin, Run like hell, he ain't you kin!" - Goblin beachcombing song

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Grindylow may not be evaded. The difficulty to defeat the Grindylow is increased by the adventure deck number of the current scenario, if any.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, a character at your location must summon and encounter the henchman Riptide Grindylow. If that henchman is defeated, the difficulty of the check to defeat Owlbeartross is increased by 4. If the Owlbeartross is undefeated, shuffle it into a random open location. If defeated, examine your location until you find a non-villain monster; then banish it.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Don't go back to Munchmeat Farm.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The difficulty of checks to defeat the Pig from Hell is increased by three times the scenario's adventure deck number. All damage dealt by the Pig from Hell is Fire damage. If defeated, you may draw a random non-Basic armor from the box.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you do not have the Summoner trait, increase the difficulty to defeat by the adventure deck number of the current scenario, if any. If undefeated, after you act, the Rogue Eidolon deals 1 point of Combat damage to each character at your location. If defeated, you may add this card to your hand. Banish the Rogue Eidolon from your hand to explore your location.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Ow! Darn it, Biter. Let go!" - Harsk

property.name: Owner
property.value: Owner: Harsk

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card on your turn to examine the top card of your location deck. If the examined card is a monster, immediately encounter it; add 1d6 to your check to defeat it.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Chuffy's face might make you sick, But Chuffy's knife is awful quick. And if you are his stabby pick, Then knife goes in you-stick stick stick!" - Chuffy's song

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card and discard any number of cards from the top of your deck; for each card discarded, add 1d6 to your check to defeat a barrier. Discard this card to explore your location. If you are the only character at your location, add 1d6 plus the scenario's adventure deck number to your combat checks during this exploration.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Droogami's what we call good friends. We're friends, right?" - Lini

property.name: Owner
property.value: Owner: Lini

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to add 1d8 to your Perception or Stealth check. Discard this card on your turn to move to another location; you may immediately explore that location.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Things go boom when Mogmurch throws, Much more fun than using bows. Sometimes when the boom boom blows Is not my fault - that's how it goes." -Mogmurch's song

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to add 2d6 and the Fire trait to any check. If at least 1 d6 rolled on that check is a 1, you are dealt 1d4-1 fire damage. Discard this card to succeed at your Craft check or to explore your location; each character at your location is dealt 1 Fire damage.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Poog say Zarongel is the best, He help burn things and heal the rest. Zarongel's favor makes Poog blessed, And Poog also stab you with knife if you make fun of how he isn't good at riding animals." -Poog's song

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to add 3 with the Fire trait to a combat check. Bury this card to recharge 1d4 random cards from your discard pile. Discard this card to explore your location.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "No, I'm not talking to you. I'm talking to my hat!" - Balazar

property.name: Owner
property.value: Owner: Balazar

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to add 1d6 to your Intelligence or Knowledge check. Discard this card to explore your location. The difficulty of your Diplomacy checks during this exploration is increased by 2.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, bury this card to use your Dexterity or Ranged skill + 1d8 and add the Fire and Ranged traits; this counts as playing a weapon instead of an armor. You may additionally choose to be dealt 2 Fire damage to add another 1d8. Recharge this card to reduce Combat or Fire damage dealt to you by 2. If you are proficient with light armors, you may play another armor on this check.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Heavy Armor Magic

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Links of steel and shiny metal, Decorate with pointy nettle, Not too pretty, might be shoddy, Helps keep blood in goblin body!" --Goblin smithing song

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to reduce Combat or Fire damage dealt to you by 3. Banish this card to reduce all damage dealt to you to 0; a random character at your location is dealt 1 Combat damage. If you are proficient with heavy armors, bury this card instead of banishing it. If you are proficient with heavy armors, you may recharge this card when you reset your hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Heavy Armor Magic

property.name: Owner
property.value: Owner: Seelah

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to reduce damage dealt to you by 2; you may play another armor on this check. If you have the Paladin trait, you may reveal this card instead of recharging it. If you are proficient with heavy armors, you may recharge this card when you reset your hand.

property.name: Owner
property.value: Owner: Kyra

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to add 1 die to any check, or to add 2 dice to any non-combat Constitution check. If you have the Cleric trait, you may play another blessing on this check. Discard this card to explore your location.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Every beastie has a taste, Whether raw or stewed to paste! If a beastie bites your hide, Climb up top and take a ride!" -Goblin hunting song.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to add 1 die to a check. Discard this card to add 2 dice to a check with the Fire trait, or to a check to defeat or acquire a card with the Animal trait. Discard this card to explore your location.

property.name: Recharge
property.value: If the top card of the blessing discard pile matches this card, recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to add 1 die to any check. Bury this card to choose a card from another character's discard pile and add it to your hand. Discard this card to explore your location. After you play this card, if the top card of the blessings discard pile is Blessing of the Gods, recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Owner
property.value: Owner: Damiel

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Bury this card to add a random item that has the Alchemical trait from the box to your hand.

property.name: Owner
property.value: Owner: Ezren

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Bury this card to use your Arcane skill instead of any listed skill for your non-combat check. After playing this card, you may succeed at an Arcane 8 check to recharge this card instead of burying it.

property.name: Owner
property.value: Owner: Seoni

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you succeed on a combat check that has the Arcane and Attack rolls, recharge this card to examine the top card of your location deck.

property.name: Owner
property.value: Owner: Lini

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to add 2 to your Survival check or to your check to close a location. Discard this card to add an ally that has the Animal trait from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Biggest, baddest, meanest, best! Crunched more birds than all the rest! Eat them up, get all fat, You the chief, now wear the hat! -- Goblin coronation song

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to evade a bane with the Goblin trait. When you defeat a bane with the Goblin trait, you may recharge this card to examine your location deck until you find a weapon, an item, or an armor; add it to your hand and shuffle the location deck.

property.name: Owner
property.value: Owner: Merisiel

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to add 1 die to your Stealth or Acrobatics check. Discard this card to add an item from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Found a prize that's locked up tight? Goblin lockpick makes it right!k Found a door that's vexing you? Goblin lockpick lets you through!" --Mogmurch, goblin alchemist

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to add 1 die to your Disable check. Bury this card to defeat a barrier; you are dealt 2d4 Fire damage.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Can't put it back together, but you can get a new skull.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Banish this card to add 1d20 to your combat check. You may additionally expend any number of mythic charges; for each charge expended, add 1d20. If you defeat the bane by at least 5, each character at your location is dealt 1d6 Fire damage. If you have the Goblin trait, bury this card instead of banishing it.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Bury an Ally

property.name: Owner
property.value: Owner: Imrijka

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you fail a check, bury this card to reroll 1 die; if you have the Inquisitor trait, add another die of the type you are rerolling. You must take the second result.

property.name: Owner
property.value: Owner: Alahazra

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you examine the top card of any deck, recharge this card to examine the bottom card of that deck. When you examine the bottom card of any deck, recharge this card to examine the top card of that deck.

property.name: Owner
property.value: Owner: Valeros

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to add 1 plus the current adventure deck number, if any, to your non-combat Constitution or Fortitude check. When you would banish a card that has the Liquid trait, recharge this card to recharge that card instead.

property.name: Owner
property.value: Owner: Harsk

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to add 1d6 to any Diplomacy or Perception check by a character at your location. When you play a boon that has the Liquid trait, reveal this card to examine the top card of your location deck.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Peppered oil, up the nose, In with all the snot it goes. When you see a horse's knees, Roast them right with burning sneeze!" Goblin wizarding song

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, discard this card to roll your Arcane or Divine die + 1d12 with the Fire trait. Discard this card to add 1d4 with the Fire trait to a combat check using a weapon. If you do not have either the Arcane or Divine skill, banish this card. If you do not have the Arcane skill, banish this card.

property.name: Recharge
property.value: Succeed at an Arcane or Divine 8 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display this card next to a location. When you encounter a card, you may evade it and move to this location. Move this card next to your previous location. Each character at that location must succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 9 check or recharge a card from his hand. At the end of the scenario, if you do not have the Arcane skill, banish this card.

property.name: Owner
property.value: Owner: Amiri

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 1d10+1; you may additionally discard this card to add 2d6 and the Cold trait. If you aren't proficient with weapons, the difficulty of this check is increased by 4.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Scurvy dogs done ate my leg, So I got this fancy peg. Pounded nails all through and through, Goblin kick now poisons you!" --Ranzak, goblin pirate

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 2d10. If you would succeed at the check, reroll the dice. You must take the lower result.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Trip the horse, watch him drop, As he whinnies, chop, chop, chop! Don't stop there, 'cause horse is big; When it croaks, dance goblin jig!" - Goblin festival song

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to roll your Strength or Melee die + 1d10+1. If you aren't proficient with weapons, the difficulty of this check is increased by 4. If you fail a combat check using this weapon, you may discard this card to ignore the result and reroll the dice. You must take the second result.

property.name: Owner
property.value: Owner: Sajan

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength, Dexterity, or Melee skill + 1d8+1; you may additionally recharge a blessing to add your Dexterity die. If you don't have the Monk trait, the difficulty of this check is increased by 4.

property.name: Owner
property.value: Owner: Alain

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 1d8 plus the adventure deck number of the current scenario, if any. If you fail a combat check with this weapon, you may discard this card to ignore the result and reroll the dice. You must take the second result. If you fail the second time, reduce the damage dealt to you by 1.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Weapon: 3 [ ] 4 [ ] 5 Spell: - Armor: 1 [ ] 2 [ ] 3 Item: 4 [ ] 5 [ ] 6 Ally: 3 [ ] 4 [ ] 5 Blessing: 4 [ ] 5 [ ] 6

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Clean out your gutters, or get sniped.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Pretty much guaranteed to have rabies.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your check that has or is against a card that has the Animal or Basic trait ([ ] or has an adventure deck number less than the current scenario), add 1d4 ([ ] 1d6) ([ ] 1d8) ([ ] 1d10) to your check. ([ ] If you acquire a card that has the Animal trait, you may banish it to shuffle 1d4 random cards from your discard pile into your deck.) When you discard ([ ] or bury) 1 or more cards, you may draw a card. property.name: Attr4
property.value: [ ] Light Armors, [ ] Heavy Armors, Weapons

property.name: Flavour
property.value:
"Goblins fight and goblins bleed, Ranzak takes what Ranzak needs. Follow orders! Don't give guff! Fight for Ranzak! He needs stuff!
Ranzak wrote this clever verse. Ranzak's smart, so you go first! Come on, pirates! Do your duty! Ranzak's ready for some booty!"
--Ranzak's song

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Weapon: 4 [ ] 5 [ ] 6 Spell: 1 [ ] 2 Armor: 1 [ ] 2 Item: 4 [ ] 5 [ ] 6 [ ] 7 [ ] 8 Ally: 1 [ ] 2 Blessing: 4 [ ] 5

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If there is another character at your location, you may evade a bane; a random other character at your location encounters it instead. Add 1d4 ([ ] +1) ([ ] +3) to your check to acquire a boon. When you acquire a boon on your turn, roll 1d6; on a ([ ] 3,) 4, 5, or 6, explore your location. [ ] When you close a location, add a plunder card from the box to your hand. [ ] If another character at your location fails a check to acquire a boon, you may attempt a check to acquire it. [ ] When you recieve plunder cards for successfully completing a scenario, you may banish any 1 of those cards and replace it with another plunder card from the box. [ ] Discard a card from the blessings deck to explore your location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If there is another character at your location, you may evade a bane; a random other character at your location encounters it instead. Add 1d4 ([ ] +1) to your check to acquire a boon. When you acquire a boon on your turn, roll 1d6; on a ([ ] 3,) 4, 5, or 6, explore your location. [ ] Recharge a card to add 2d4 to your check to defeat a barrier or a henchman, then discard the top 1d4 cards from your deck. [ ] At the end of your move step, if you are the only character at your location, you may move a random other character to your location. [ ] After you defeat a monster from a location deck, you may examine the top card of that deck; if it's a boon, banish it. [ ] If you defeat a henchman by at least 6, add 1d6 ([ ] 2d6) to your check to close the location, if any.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Class 0

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, summon and encounter the henchman Riptide Grindylow.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Instead of your first exploration each turn, you may choose another character at your location and add 1 random card from his discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Class 0

property.name: Flavour
property.value: If they brings a tasty goat, Peoples welcome on our boat! You can gain the rank of private After teaching us to drive it.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: When you encounter a card, all other characters at this location move to a random closed location.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Class 6

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, each character at this location must bury a card.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Reduce Structural damage to this ship by 1d4; if you roll a 1, bury a card. If you would fail a combat check by 2 or less, you may discard a card from the blessings deck to succeed.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Class 6

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Years ago, Captain Lantern discovered the location of a legendary treasure. A recent mutiny led by his wife, Varossa Lantern, has left both this ship and his secret under new ownership

property.name: Attr2
property.value: At the start of your turn, roll 1d4; on a 1, bury a card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Class 5

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If any character would discard any cards during the check to defeat the Mistmourn, bury those cards instead.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Reduce Structural damage to this ship by 2. You may discard a card from the blessings deck to evade a bane.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Class 5

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The Mordant Spire elves speak in hushed tones of a dragon ship that ransacked many treasures of lore. Word is that an elven armada sank the beast, but word is often unreliable in the Shackles

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Whenever you banish cards, banish 1 additional card from your hand.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: To the denizens of a port city, there's no sight in the harbor more troubling than a ship full of undead cyclopes looking to smash everything they see. The navigator has an eye patch, so he has no idea where they're going, but they're still coming to your town.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Harbor Riptide Cove Ghol-Gan Ruins Docks Floating Shipyard Coastline Merchant Marina Seaside Warehouse

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Shuffle 6 Gholdako henchmen into the blessings deck. After you advance the blessings deck, if the top card of the blessings discard pile is a Gholdako, put it on top of a random open location deck. When you would banish a Gholdako, display it next to this card instead. To win the scenario, all 6 Gholdakos must be next to this card.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Gain a ship feat in a class in which you have checked off a ship.
